item.title: 5 Life Design Alternatives to 9 to 5
item.description: I hate sitting in a cubicle for more than 30 minutes. A part of me feels like it is a prison that I need to emerge from in order to have a real life.

item.title: The two types of stress you absolutely need to know
item.description: Retire from your job but never from meaningful projects.
